lines.text: Can someone get through it with a Dimension Door?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want to just go through?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then try to dispel the glyph on the other side?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I should be able to do that now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Try to dispel the glyph.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Magic can go through a Wall of Force.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could also try Stone Shape to go under it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That would take a while, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's an action, it's five feet of--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You tell me. You're the magic users.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So Dimension Door is probably the smarter way to go here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And are you going to try to get inside that room?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can't be dispelled by Dispel Magic-- (gasps) Oh shit!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't have that anymore, so you're going in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you have enough to go both ways with Dimension Door?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I'll probably need Nott to unlock the door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going to go into the door?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to try to first dispel the glyph through this because-- Do I understand the spell correctly: only physical things cannot go through it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing can physically pass through the wall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I'm going to try to dispel the glyph at 4th-level.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I tried to do the wall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought it was something else.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll a d20 and add your intelligence modifier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. The glyph scatters and then vanishes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just the glyph, but not the wall?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But if you can go both ways, if you can Dimension Door in and Dimension Door out with Veth, then we might be able to pull this off still.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do you mean unlock the door? You can just Dimension Door inside the door!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could be bamfing myself into...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But just go inside the room! Just take us inside the room! Why would we meet to unlock the door, too? Just go in!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can't you just Mage Hand through the door? I mean, through the force wall?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your Mage Hand appears and floats over.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I'll try to unlock the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is a sound lock and that was not high enough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, but they can't physically go through, that's right! It would be able to way lower.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just try to tickle them with your pinky.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not going to be a Pit of Despair, and if it is, we're dead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One foot on the other side of the door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One foot on the other side of the door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Two feet on the other side of door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if it's a foot-wide door!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to Dimension Door us into the room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: ♪ Your love, how deep is your love ♪

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: ♪ Fusing with a safe ♪ ♪ And it hurts ♪

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You both appear inside the chamber.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there a hole in the floor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is not a hole in the floor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It looks like a hole in the floor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some of it's empty, but there are-- it's like a half-filled vault.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we don't know where it is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's lots of shit, right? In here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should just start grabbing stuff.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Beauregard, roll perception check for me, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is that a roll for?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Even after you snapped his neck?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have a great bead on the central--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 12, and thank you for burning a natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wow! Okay! You can see a group of soldiers that are emerging from one of the nearby hedge openings, heading towards this structure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trent Ikithon is rushing towards this chamber.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Probably knows when we stepped into the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to back up five feet and I'm going to use my Channel Divinity and a Marine Layer will start to slowly permeate through the woods around myself, Yasha, and Caduceus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 foot cube, so this is a smaller dragon to fit the wingspan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But still tearing out of the woods of wherever the fuck we are right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it slams into it, you see the group of guards, which now you can see about four of them, flanking Ikithon, and they all look over to the side and the guards go, "Shit, shit!" They get their weapons and start getting ready and Ikithon just looks at it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, he doesn't give a fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're both inside this chamber.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Locate Object.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is locked, but you can sense within there are numerous.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we just take the whole case?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's heavy, but not crazy heavy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, would it fit in the haversack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would not fit in the haversack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grab anything else you see within reach and I'll just shove anything else I see, I'm going to shove it in my bag and then I'm going to cast Dimension Door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are there anything grabbable by my little dainty fingers?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make an investigation check if you want to look through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everything else in here seems under heavier lock and key.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If she doesn't grab anything in three seconds, we're out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are any of them liftable by me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make a strength check to grab the next big up?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to try to open one of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, picking a lock real fast is going to be high DC, give it a shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you just start grabbing them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pop them in the sack, pop it in my pocket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are reacting, see Trent Ikithon see this, look back, narrows his eyes and then vanishes from sight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to go grab the back of--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He vanishes? He just poofs, gone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seemed like what may have been an informed disturbance has elevated his need for haste with the appearance of an illusory dragon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Red hot, red hot! We're leaving fast! Get outta here! Move! Get! Go!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Red hot, red hot, red hot!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I see their signal and I run and I just jump over the edge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hmm, you look over and you just see a large thing of fog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I see a red dragon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: and one of them's screaming and running.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm still going to jump off of the tower and nestle near that door that Jester painted.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have not heard from anybody.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Veth, I heard you loud and clear! We are waiting for you!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am just fixated towards that dragon and the fog cloud. Just eyes peeled, waiting for anything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to start moving towards the edge of the fog cloud.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm going to cast Word of Recall as soon as I'm touching Caleb and Veth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You cast Word of Recall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With that kind of stuff, maybe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as you can't figure what's happening--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, no, no, no, no, no, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- you hear from the top of the stairs--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, if this isn't extremely curious." And we're going to end the episode there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, we have to keep playing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So we're going to pick that up next episode.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Half the party with a huge archmage, half your slots gone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But at least you got those blue crystals.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Weirdly, that was what did it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, Veth and me summoning a red dragon that he knew was a diversion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. He wouldn't have gotten there that quickly if he wasn't set off that there was-- what was from his standpoint, a definite diversion.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I would've done the same thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So we'll pick up from there next week.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And half the team got told, "Red hot," and I'm just really confused.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're not going to leave without you, but where are you? Oh my god!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But then what are you guys going to say? You guys got to tip us off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, if you don't say anything the minute we get her back, we're out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I've already said what we're going to say.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So unless you've got another message...

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We might have to go in there now!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We have a week to figure this out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Had I not been, then we probably would've bamfed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am pinging to you, and if I see him, I mean, I would--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was the multiple Fireballs, to the guards managing to go and inform somebody.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And is it Thursday yet? Good night.
